label: AB3_oP16_62_c_3c-001
title: Molybdite (MoO$_{3}$, $D0_{8}$) Structure
comments: The unit cell and atomic positions were originally given in the $Pbnm$ orientation of space group \#62. We have rotated the crystal axis, taking $\mathbf{\hat{y}} \rightarrow \mathbf{\hat{x}} \rightarrow \mathbf{\hat{z}}$ to put the system in the standard $Pnma$ representation.
